title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-2.1 - General purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-2.1 - General purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to regulate recreational
activities in or on the waters of Lake George in order to protect the public
health, safety and welfare, to provide reasonable public access to Lake George
without overcrowding, congestion or safety hazards, to reduce noise and to
protect the resources of the park. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
646-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
